name: Yuko
description: After rank 2 of the Chariot social link you will meet Yuko and you need to activate a flag by Inviting her to walk home with you. After you start her social link she's available on Wednesday and Saturday. She's located on the stairs opposite of Fuuka.
ranks: Rank 2: What happened? > I agree > That's true
Rank 3: Not really > Anything > Let's go
Rank 4: Anything x2 > No worries > I'm honored
Rank 5: Anything > Do you know him? < It's up to you
Rank 6: Let's hope for the best
Rank 9: Forget about what? > An instructor
unlocks: For completing this social link you are able to fuse Siegfried through normal or triangle fusion
